stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter a beautiful translucent person which is flitting from one side of the road to the other. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You spend the week drinking. You gain some friends and build a tolerance.
You spend the week serving mead. You are charming and are tipped well!
Try to sing to it
options.successText: Your singing encourages the ghostly person. They seem satisfied and join in song with you.
options.failureText: They are immediately disgusted by your performance. They disappear before you even finish. In your shame you decide not to go perform any time soon.

options.attemptText: Try to catch them!
options.successText: Your speed is outmatched and your prey leaps sideways directly into the spot you predicted they would. You guess their true fey form and request a wish out of them. They look at you, defeated and grant it.
options.failureText: You attempt to predict their movements, but you're not quick enough. You trip and fall into a ditch and they laugh at you. You feel silly.

stories.prompt: Afterwards, you notice that the head of the Town Council is having an estate sale

options.attemptText: You spend the week contributing to the town's systems of governance. The rigorous discussion improves your ability to make your voice heard.
You spend the week learning about the town's history. You feel better prepared for the road ahead.

options.optionText: Work for the lord moving heavy objects
options.attemptText: Work for the lord moving heavy objects
options.successText: You're given employee of the month and awarded a priceless jar of the lord's nail clippings
options.failureText: Your work is cut short by a hernia. You are not paid and are kicked out.

options.optionText: Peruse the items and make a purchase
options.attemptText: Peruse the items and make a purchase
options.successText: You haggle for a nice pair of boots, and upon putting them on your feet you feel light as a feather
options.failureText: You can't find anything nice that you can actually afford. You eat a cold bowl of soup for dinner, but you still feel empty

stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter a beautiful translucent person which is tethered to an enormous troll. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You spend the week drinking. You gain some friends and build a tolerance.
You spend the week serving mead. You are charming and are tipped well!
Try to sing to it
options.successText: Your singing encourages the ghostly person. They seem satisfied and join in song with you.
options.failureText: They are immediately disgusted by your performance. They disappear before you even finish. In your shame you decide not to go perform any time soon.

options.attemptText: Try to cut the tether
options.successText: You slice through the tether like butter and the troll shrieks with agony. Together, the two of you use the tether to trip the troll up and flee. You high-five! Weird!
options.failureText: The troll makes eye contact with you as your knife hits the tether with a plunk. It remains unbroken. The troll decks you soundly in the face and its prisoner utters a sullen 'Thanks a lot.'

stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter a tiny and mischievous nixie which tells you a story about its life. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You spend the week planting and caring for the plant life. Your standing with nature improves.
You spend the tending to the beasts and retrieving their pelts and milks. Your body hardens and you get to pet lots of cute critters.
Offer the nixie some coin
options.successText: You give it some coin and it is immediately pleased. It spins in a circle, spewing a strange dust upon you. You feel yourself change for the better.
options.failureText: The creature resents your offering. Perhaps you should not have been so stingy. It sneezes upon you before allowing itself to become absorbed into a nearby tree stump. You feel bad.

options.optionText: Offer your own story in return
options.attemptText: Offer your own story in return
options.successText: The two of you swap stories well into the night. You almost don't notice when your companion fades away. You feel lonely, but fulfilled.
options.failureText: Your companion is incensed that you would talk about yourself instead of take an interest. You jerk.

stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter an enormous and strange furry beast which is flitting from one side of the road to the other. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You spend the week contributing to the town's systems of governance. The rigorous discussion improves your ability to make your voice heard.
You spend the week learning about the town's history. You feel better prepared for the road ahead.
Attempt to overpower the beast
options.successText: With great effort you pin the beast down. It is impressed. It bows to you before bucking and running to freedom.
options.failureText: The beast is not phased by your assault and seems confused about why you are trying to fight it. Why did you do that?

options.attemptText: Try to catch them!
options.successText: Your speed is outmatched and your prey leaps sideways directly into the spot you predicted they would. You guess their true fey form and request a wish out of them. They look at you, defeated and grant it.
options.failureText: You attempt to predict their movements, but you're not quick enough. You trip and fall into a ditch and they laugh at you. You feel silly.

You spend the week learning about the town's history. You feel better prepared for the road ahead.

stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter an enormous and strange furry beast which begs you for food. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You spend the week drinking. You gain some friends and build a tolerance.
You spend the week serving mead. You are charming and are tipped well!
Attempt to overpower the beast
options.successText: With great effort you pin the beast down. It is impressed. It bows to you before bucking and running to freedom.
options.failureText: The beast is not phased by your assault and seems confused about why you are trying to fight it. Why did you do that?

options.attemptText: Offer what you have
options.successText: They devour the food hungrily. You see the genuine gleam in their eyes as they finish, their belly filled. Somewhere in the ether, a force for morality gives you a gift.
options.failureText: They stare at the single grape you procure from your cloak with irony and then hatred. They spit in your face.

stories.prompt: You meet a Dryad deep in the forest. How do you interact with her?

options.attemptText: You spend the week wandering in the wilds and avoiding danger. Your footing improves and you even find some treasure.
You spend the week looking for resources for the town. You learn a lot about the forest surrounding your town!
Ask her to dance
options.successText: She is overjoyed! You dance through the night and she kisses you at sunrise
options.failureText: As you dance the dryad becomes more and more sullen in reaction to your clumsy stepping. As the sun sets she morphs into a horrid fae beast. She shrieks and flies into the night.

options.attemptText: Engage in Meaningful Conversation
options.successText: She is surprised, but she perks up. You talk about the beautiful things in life until the sun rises.
options.failureText: She is hesitant at first and her hesitation is well founded. Early on you mention your edgy opinions on flowers and no matter what you say she is disappointed. She leaves in a huff.

stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter a tiny and mischievous nixie which is tethered to an enormous troll. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You dance in the center of the town square for coin. People enjoy your energy and some even drop some coin!
You spend the week serving mead to the locals. You make some coin and put in some hard work.
Offer the nixie some coin
options.successText: You give it some coin and it is immediately pleased. It spins in a circle, spewing a strange dust upon you. You feel yourself change for the better.
options.failureText: The creature resents your offering. Perhaps you should not have been so stingy. It sneezes upon you before allowing itself to become absorbed into a nearby tree stump. You feel bad.

options.attemptText: Try to cut the tether
options.successText: You slice through the tether like butter and the troll shrieks with agony. Together, the two of you use the tether to trip the troll up and flee. You high-five! Weird!
options.failureText: The troll makes eye contact with you as your knife hits the tether with a plunk. It remains unbroken. The troll decks you soundly in the face and its prisoner utters a sullen 'Thanks a lot.'

stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter a great winged spirit which tells you a story about its life. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You dance in the center of the town square for coin. People enjoy your energy and some even drop some coin!
You spend the week serving mead to the locals. You make some coin and put in some hard work.
Cast a binding hex
options.successText: The spirit twitches and resists, but is eventually bound by your words and grants you a boon against its wishes. Good job?
options.failureText: The creature sees what you are attempting to do and casts its own hex. You wake up the next day feeling terrible.

options.optionText: Offer your own story in return
options.attemptText: Offer your own story in return
options.successText: The two of you swap stories well into the night. You almost don't notice when your companion fades away. You feel lonely, but fulfilled.
options.failureText: Your companion is incensed that you would talk about yourself instead of take an interest. You jerk.

stories.prompt: As you leave and travel upon the road you encounter a beautiful translucent person which asks you how you would run the harvest if you were a god. How do you proceed?

options.attemptText: You spend the week in pious reverie. You feel the glow and self-satisfaction of knowing you are in good standing with your god.
You spend the week helping to erect the display for the harvest ritual. Your body is hardened by the good work and your soul is enriched.
Try to sing to it
options.successText: Your singing encourages the ghostly person. They seem satisfied and join in song with you.
options.failureText: They are immediately disgusted by your performance. They disappear before you even finish. In your shame you decide not to go perform any time soon.

options.optionText: Say you would only ask for a sacrifice if there were too many mouths to feed
options.attemptText: Say you would only ask for a sacrifice if there were too many mouths to feed
options.successText: They ponder for a moment and then... they agree with you. This is a fair way to rule. They say that you should be running things around her and you agree!
options.failureText: They ponder for a moment and then... they smirk and begin to laugh. 'Such a simple way to look at things.' You feel very stupid.

options.attemptText: You spend the week drinking. You gain some friends and build a tolerance.
You spend the week serving mead. You are charming and are tipped well!

ritualOptions.attemptText: You lead the rhythmic chants, setting the ritual's tone.
ritualOptions.successText: Your powerful voice resonates, guiding the ritual to new heights!
ritualOptions.failureText: Your voice wavers, and the chant loses its rhythm.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You work to gather the other dancers around the pyre.
ritualOptions.successText: Your sense of flow and natural athletic artistry spurs the town into a magnificent choreographed display!
ritualOptions.failureText: The other dancers appreciate your efforts, but there is only so many times you can step on other people's toes before they move on to other tasks.
ritualOptions.successMarginText: You feel completely enveloped by the love of your god as you complete your duties. As the warmth of the faith in your heart grows you become sure you're of the most important parts of the ritual.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You announce the phases of the ceremony with confidence.
ritualOptions.successText: Your eloquence ensures the ritual runs smoothly and inspires awe!
ritualOptions.failureText: Your words falter, and the crowd grows restless.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You embrace chaos, playing the trickster within the ritual.
ritualOptions.successText: Your antics bring unexpected wisdom through humor!
ritualOptions.failureText: Your jokes fall flat, and confusion ensues.
ritualOptions.successMarginText: You feel completely enveloped by the love of your god as you complete your duties. As the warmth of the faith in your heart grows you become sure you're of the most important parts of the ritual.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You peer into the flames, divining the ritual's deeper meaning.
ritualOptions.successText: A clear vision emerges, guiding the town's future.
ritualOptions.failureText: Your vision is clouded, leaving uncertainty.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You orchestrate playful disruption to challenge expectations.
ritualOptions.successText: Your cunning and agility keep the ceremony lively!
ritualOptions.failureText: Your antics cause more chaos than intended.
ritualOptions.successMarginText: You feel completely enveloped by the love of your god as you complete your duties. As the warmth of the faith in your heart grows you become sure you're of the most important parts of the ritual.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You ensure the sacred space is properly prepared.
ritualOptions.successText: The ritual ground radiates energy, amplifying the spellwork.
ritualOptions.failureText: The space remains mundane, the energy unshaped.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You move between the seen and unseen, guiding the spirits.
ritualOptions.successText: You dance the border of worlds, bridging the realms.
ritualOptions.failureText: The spirits remain distant, their whispers unheard.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You tend the sacred fire, ensuring its steady glow.
ritualOptions.successText: The flames blaze high, illuminating the ritual with power.
ritualOptions.failureText: The fire sputters, casting uncertain shadows.
ritualOptions.successMarginText: As the night continues you feel the presence of Erysus more and more. She looks upon you positively. You've helped a good bit!

ritualOptions.attemptText: You work to place and empower the sacred stones.
ritualOptions.successText: The stones resonate with energy, forming a potent circle.
ritualOptions.failureText: The placements feel unbalanced, weakening the ritual.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You inscribe sacred runes to channel energy.
ritualOptions.successText: The runes glow with power, enhancing the ritual’s intent.
ritualOptions.failureText: The symbols lack clarity, and their power falters.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You oversee the sacred meal, ensuring offerings are honored.
ritualOptions.successText: The feast is perfectly balanced, nourishing both body and spirit.
ritualOptions.failureText: The offerings feel lacking, diminishing the ritual’s blessing.

ritualOptions.attemptText: You call upon the presence of the god Erysus.
ritualOptions.successText: The god's presence fills the space, empowering all present.
ritualOptions.failureText: Your voice falters, and the connection feels weak.
